description: This slightly sweet ginger chicken ramen is a bowl of warming comfort food.
name: Chicken & Ginger Ramen Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g chicken breasts, skinless, sliced into strips
5cm ginger, peeled and sliced into matchsticks
1.2L chicken stock, made with 2 stock cubes, hot
6 medium spring onions, sliced, tops reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large, deep pan and cook the chicken strips for 4 minutes on each side, remove from the pan and set aside.
Heat the rest of the oil in the pan and cook the mushrooms for 5 minutes until browned. Stir in the garlic, ginger and miso and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour over the stock, bring to the boil and reduce the heat. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Bring the soup back to the boil, add the noodles and bok choi cook for 4 minutes, stir in the spring onions and cook for 2 minutes. Season with honey to taste.
Serve in bowls with chicken and spring onion tops on top.
